cover_letter.intro_para: I am interested in the Analyst position within the Ameresco Project Management team. During my time at BlueWave Capital, I recieved some exposure to Ameresco's work and was immediately impressed. After evaluating Ameresco's development history and continual production of quality work , I became interested in this position. I have enjoyed my past work with Solar Project Development in the past and I think I will fit well with Ameresco's challenging culture and bring all the necessary abilities to go above and beyond my job requirements.

para_background.experience: Throughout my three co-ops at Northeastern University, I was able to hone my AutoCAD and Excel skills in a manner that increased the efficiency of my work as well as that of my peers'. Excel proved to be increasingly useful as I recognized areas of inneficiency within my previous companies' workflow and was able to develop macros to automate previously manual processes.

At Northeastern, I gained technical communication skills from my work within the Sustainable Energy Systems minor. Through various projects within the graduate classes associated with this program I was able to utilize the knowledge gained in my earlier classes as well as on my co-ops to work towards unique solutions to proposed issues regarding the leglislative, economic, and environmental issues assocated with solar energy.

My final project at Northeastern allowed me to improve my ability to communicate effectively with various specialists to work toward a common goal. My capstone project to design a potable water distribution system as well as energy generation facility in Haiti let me communicate with environmental and electric specialists as I filled the role of solar development specialist.

closing_statements.compatability: I believe my skills and passion for renewable energy will help me to fit in well with a Ameresco team and have a positive impact on the Project Management Team.
closing_statements.next_step: Please call me at 617-319-5868 to discuss the possibility of continuing to the interview phase of the hiring process.
